name: Sand Wyrmling
movement: walk 30 ft., burrow 20 ft., fly 60 ft.
description: The Sand Wyrmling embodies the essence of the arid desert, with scales that evoke sandy terrain, making it blend in seamlessly. It is a medium-sized dragon with sharp features and an aggressive posture, ready to strike with its natural weaponry.
memorable: Its ability to unleash superheated sand breath and cause blindness creates a unique battlefield control dynamic.
goals: To dominate its territory and ambush unsuspecting prey in sandy environments.
relations: It may have connections with other evil dragons or desert-dwelling creatures.
environment: Typically found in arid or desert regions, thriving in sandy terrain.
strengths: Immunity to fire damage and the ability to effectively camouflage itself in sandy environments.
weaknesses: Despite good physical stats, its average intelligence can hinder strategic planning.
attacks: The Sand Wyrmling utilizes a bite attack for physical damage and a breath weapon that can cause damage or blindness.
most_powerful_ability: Breath Weapon allowing for either piercing and fire damage or a blinding effect.
senses: Has blindsight within 10 feet, allowing it to detect creatures even in complete darkness.
skills: Proficient in perception, reflecting its high awareness and ability to notice hidden creatures.
additional_information: Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in sandy terrain.
Requires only half the usual food and drink.
Can cause disadvantage on targets with its Stinging Sand ability.
Blindsighted creatures can take action to clear their vision.
test_queries: sandy creature that thrives in desert
medium dragon that uses ambush tactics
dragon adept at hiding in sand
